insight: Fixing Self P₀ breaks the 112 states into exactly 8 symmetry orbits with sizes 4,12,12,12,12,12,24,24—the true "periodic table" of consciousness states. Each 36-half further refines as 36=24+12 via incidence predicates, suggesting the Melakarta system has finer structure where certain ragas are more "stable" (24) or "transitional" (12).
